list.name: Changes
list.comment:
``` refactor: Update project settings and remove unused resources
This commit includes the following changes:
- Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to change the `selectedTabId` in the `ProblemsViewState` to `CurrentFile`. - Removes content from `app/src/main/res/values/styles.xml`, `app/src/main/res/values/colors.xml` effectively removing custom theme definitions. - Clears all shortcut definitions by deleting `app/src/main/res/xml/shortcuts.xml`. - Clears all file paths definitions by deleting `app/src/main/res/xml/filepaths.xml`. - Remove all icons and images from mipmaps and drawables folder. - Added new `MainActivity.java`. - Added new layout `activity_main.xml`. - Add integrity check on `LauncherActivity.java`. - Added new files for the integrity check logic. - Added new values files `values.xml`,`values2.xml`,`values3.xml`,`refs.xml`,`colors2.xml`,`styles2.xml`. - Modified the `AndroidManifest.xml` to add `MainActivity.java`. - Added new `app.xml` configuration file. - Remove all TWA setting from `build.gradle`. - Modified the `strings.xml` file. ```

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Android App.LauncherActivity.executor": "Run", "Android App.MainActivity.executor": "Run", "Android App.Sin nombre.executor": "Debug", "Android App.app.executor": "Run", "ResourceManagerPrefKey.ResourceType": "LAYOUT", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.cidr.known.project.marker": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "RunOnceActivity.readMode.enableVisualFormatting": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "cf.first.check.clang-format": "false", "cidr.known.project.marker": "true", "com.google.services.firebase.aqiPopupShown": "true", "deletionFromPopupRequiresConfirmation": "false", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/diego/StudioProjects/AprendeProgramarAndroidStudioCode", "project.structure.last.edited": "Project", "project.structure.proportion": "0.17", "project.structure.side.proportion": "0.2", "run.code.analysis.last.selected.profile": "pProject Default", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "memory.settings" } }

task.summary:
``` feat: Configure project for Git and enable Gradle configuration cache
This commit introduces the following changes:
- Adds `.idea/vcs.xml` to configure the project's root directory to use Git for version control. - Enables the Gradle configuration cache by setting `org.gradle.configuration-cache=true` in `gradle.properties`. ```

``` refactor: Update Gradle settings with migration version
This commit updates the Gradle settings in `.idea/gradle.xml` to include the migration version, setting `migrationVersion` to "1". ```

``` feat: Add Firebase Crashlytics settings to App Insights
This commit adds Firebase Crashlytics settings to the App Insights configuration in `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml`. The new settings include placeholder values for `appId`, `mobileSdkAppId`, `projectId`, and `projectNumber`. It also sets the signal to `SIGNAL_UNSPECIFIED`, the time interval to `THIRTY_DAYS`, and the visibility type to `ALL`. ```

``` feat: Integrate Firebase services and update project configurations
This commit introduces the following changes:
- Adds `google-services.json` to the `app` directory, configuring Firebase services with project-specific details such as project ID, storage bucket, and API keys. - Updates the root `build.gradle` to include the `google-services` and `firebase-crashlytics-gradle` plugins. - Modifies `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml` to include project connection details, setting the app ID, mobile SDK app ID, project ID, and project number. - Updates `app/build.gradle` to apply the `google-services` and `firebase-crashlytics` plugins and adds the `firebase-crashlytics` implementation. ```

``` feat: Add project configuration to workspace
This commit adds `.idea/workspace.xml`, which includes various configurations for the project, such as:
- Git settings for pushing and updating. - Gradle project states and management. - Execution target settings for Android app runs. - Settings for Firebase Crashlytics, including connection details and debugging configurations. - Task management configurations for project build. ```

``` feat: Add project configuration to workspace
This commit adds `.idea/workspace.xml`, which includes various configurations for the project, such as:
- Git settings for pushing and updating. - Gradle project states and management. - Execution target settings for Android app runs. - Settings for Firebase Crashlytics, including connection details and debugging configurations. - Task management configurations for project build. ```

``` feat: Update project workspace configuration
This commit updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to include changes list metadata and Git settings:
- Adds changelist metadata. - Adds previous commit authors. - Enables signing off commits. ```

``` refactor: Update project configurations and settings
This commit includes several updates to project settings and configurations:
- Updates `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml` to switch the selected tab to "Firebase Crashlytics". - Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to include changes list metadata and Git settings, including previous commit authors and enabling sign-off commits. - Modifies `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/LauncherActivity.java` to simplify the orientation setting logic, no longer limiting it by the Android version. - Updates `app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml` to add the `tools` namespace, `targetApi` attribute, and changes the `exported` and `permission` attribute of `PaymentService` . - Updates `.idea/caches/deviceStreaming.xml` to include new device configurations. ```

``` refactor: Update project configurations and settings
This commit includes several updates to project settings and configurations:
- Updates `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml` to switch the selected tab to "Firebase Crashlytics". - Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to include changes list metadata and Git settings, including previous commit authors and enabling sign-off commits. - Modifies `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/LauncherActivity.java` to simplify the orientation setting logic, no longer limiting it by the Android version. - Updates `app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml` to add the `tools` namespace, `targetApi` attribute, and changes the `exported` and `permission` attribute of `PaymentService`. - Updates `.idea/caches/deviceStreaming.xml` to include new device configurations. - Removes `app/src/main/res/drawable-anydpi/shortcut_legacy_background.xml` and `app/src/main/res/raw/web_app_manifest.json` - Removes `shortcut_background` color in `app/src/main/res/values/colors.xml`. - Replace jcenter with mavenCentral in `build.gradle`. - Removes unnecessary code from `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/Application.java`. - Change minsdk to 26 and version Name to 4.0.0.0 in `app/build.gradle`. - Add activity_launcher.xml and styles.xml. ```

``` refactor: Update project configurations and settings
This commit includes several updates to project settings and configurations:
- Updates `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml` to switch the selected tab to "Firebase Crashlytics". - Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to include changes list metadata and Git settings, including previous commit authors and enabling sign-off commits. - Modifies `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/LauncherActivity.java` to simplify the orientation setting logic, no longer limiting it by the Android version. - Updates `app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml` to add the `tools` namespace, `targetApi` attribute, and changes the `exported` and `permission` attribute of `PaymentService`. - Updates `.idea/caches/deviceStreaming.xml` to include new device configurations. - Removes `app/src/main/res/drawable-anydpi/shortcut_legacy_background.xml` and `app/src/main/res/raw/web_app_manifest.json` - Removes `shortcut_background` color in `app/src/main/res/values/colors.xml`. - Replace jcenter with mavenCentral in `build.gradle`. - Removes unnecessary code from `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/Application.java`. - Change minsdk to 26 and version Name to 4.0.0.0 in `app/build.gradle`. - Add activity_launcher.xml and styles.xml. ```

``` refactor: Update project settings and shortcut configuration
This commit includes the following changes:
- Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to change the `selectedTabId` in the `ProblemsViewState` to `ProjectErrors`. - Removes content from `app/src/main/res/values/styles.xml`, effectively removing custom theme definitions. - Clears all shortcut definitions by setting an empty definition in `app/src/main/res/xml/shortcuts.xml`. ```

``` feat: Configure project for Git and enable Gradle configuration cache
This commit introduces the following changes:
- Adds `.idea/vcs.xml` to configure the project's root directory to use Git for version control. - Enables the Gradle configuration cache by setting `org.gradle.configuration-cache=true` in `gradle.properties`. ```

``` refactor: Update Gradle settings with migration version
This commit updates the Gradle settings in `.idea/gradle.xml` to include the migration version, setting `migrationVersion` to "1". ```

``` feat: Add Firebase Crashlytics settings to App Insights
This commit adds Firebase Crashlytics settings to the App Insights configuration in `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml`. The new settings include placeholder values for `appId`, `mobileSdkAppId`, `projectId`, and `projectNumber`. It also sets the signal to `SIGNAL_UNSPECIFIED`, the time interval to `THIRTY_DAYS`, and the visibility type to `ALL`. ```

``` feat: Integrate Firebase services and update project configurations
This commit introduces the following changes:
- Adds `google-services.json` to the `app` directory, configuring Firebase services with project-specific details such as project ID, storage bucket, and API keys. - Updates the root `build.gradle` to include the `google-services` and `firebase-crashlytics-gradle` plugins. - Modifies `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml` to include project connection details, setting the app ID, mobile SDK app ID, project ID, and project number. - Updates `app/build.gradle` to apply the `google-services` and `firebase-crashlytics` plugins and adds the `firebase-crashlytics` implementation. ```

- Git settings for pushing and updating. - Gradle project states and management. - Execution target settings for Android app runs. - Settings for Firebase Crashlytics, including connection details and debugging configurations. - Task management configurations for project build. ```

``` feat: Update project workspace configuration
This commit updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to include changes list metadata and Git settings:
- Adds changelist metadata. - Adds previous commit authors. - Enables signing off commits. ```

``` refactor: Update project configurations and settings
This commit includes several updates to project settings and configurations:
- Updates `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml` to switch the selected tab to "Firebase Crashlytics". - Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to include changes list metadata and Git settings, including previous commit authors and enabling sign-off commits. - Modifies `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/LauncherActivity.java` to simplify the orientation setting logic, no longer limiting it by the Android version. - Updates `app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml` to add the `tools` namespace, `targetApi` attribute, and changes the `exported` and `permission` attribute of `PaymentService` . - Updates `.idea/caches/deviceStreaming.xml` to include new device configurations. ```

``` refactor: Update project configurations and settings
This commit includes several updates to project settings and configurations:
- Updates `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml` to switch the selected tab to "Firebase Crashlytics". - Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to include changes list metadata and Git settings, including previous commit authors and enabling sign-off commits. - Modifies `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/LauncherActivity.java` to simplify the orientation setting logic, no longer limiting it by the Android version. - Updates `app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml` to add the `tools` namespace, `targetApi` attribute, and changes the `exported` and `permission` attribute of `PaymentService`. - Updates `.idea/caches/deviceStreaming.xml` to include new device configurations. - Removes `app/src/main/res/drawable-anydpi/shortcut_legacy_background.xml` and `app/src/main/res/raw/web_app_manifest.json` - Removes `shortcut_background` color in `app/src/main/res/values/colors.xml`. - Replace jcenter with mavenCentral in `build.gradle`. - Removes unnecesary code from `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/Application.java`. - Change minsdk to 26 and version Name to 4.0.0.0 in `app/build.gradle`. ```

This commit includes several updates to project settings and configurations:
- Updates `.idea/appInsightsSettings.xml` to switch the selected tab to "Firebase Crashlytics". - Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to include changes list metadata and Git settings, including previous commit authors and enabling sign-off commits. - Modifies `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/LauncherActivity.java` to simplify the orientation setting logic, no longer limiting it by the Android version. - Updates `app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml` to add the `tools` namespace, `targetApi` attribute, and changes the `exported` and `permission` attribute of `PaymentService`. - Updates `.idea/caches/deviceStreaming.xml` to include new device configurations. - Removes `app/src/main/res/drawable-anydpi/shortcut_legacy_background.xml` and `app/src/main/res/raw/web_app_manifest.json` - Removes `shortcut_background` color in `app/src/main/res/values/colors.xml`. - Replace jcenter with mavenCentral in `build.gradle`. - Removes unnecessary code from `app/src/main/java/com/playconsole/aprendeprogramar2/Application.java`. - Change minsdk to 26 and version Name to 4.0.0.0 in `app/build.gradle`. - Add activity_launcher.xml and styles.xml. ```

This commit includes the following changes:
- Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to change the `selectedTabId` in the `ProblemsViewState` to `ProjectErrors`. - Removes content from `app/src/main/res/values/styles.xml`, effectively removing custom theme definitions. - Clears all shortcut definitions by setting an empty definition in `app/src/main/res/xml/shortcuts.xml`. ```

``` refactor: Update project settings and remove unused resources
This commit includes the following changes:
- Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to change the `selectedTabId` in the `ProblemsViewState` to `CurrentFile`. - Removes content from `app/src/main/res/values/styles.xml`, `app/src/main/res/values/colors.xml` effectively removing custom theme definitions. - Clears all shortcut definitions by deleting `app/src/main/res/xml/shortcuts.xml`. - Clears all file paths definitions by deleting `app/src/main/res/xml/filepaths.xml`. - Remove all icons and images from mipmaps and drawables folder. - Added new `MainActivity.java`. - Added new layout `activity_main.xml`. - Add integrity check on `LauncherActivity.java`. - Added new files for the integrity check logic. - Added new values files `values.xml`,`values2.xml`,`values3.xml`,`refs.xml`,`colors2.xml`,`styles2.xml`. - Modified the `AndroidManifest.xml` to add `MainActivity.java`. - Added new `app.xml` configuration file. - Remove all TWA setting from `build.gradle`. - Modified the `strings.xml` file. ```
